message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a valuable item at a reasonable price. Looking forward to your response!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  $95 is a bit higher than I was hoping for. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $90. I believe this strikes a fair balance between our interests. Please let me know if this works for you.
